tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ProductLifeCycle (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  manufacturing_process TEXT,
  eco_impact_assessment TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessment (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    energy_consumption DECIMAL,
    waste_production DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Product (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE LifeCycleAssessment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    material VARCHAR(100),
    energy_consumption DECIMAL(10, 2),
    emission_level DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Product(id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalImpact (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT,
    impact_area VARCHAR(100),
    impact_score DECIMAL(10, 2),
    analysis_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (assessment_id) REFERENCES LifeCycleAssessment(id)
);

CREATE TABLE GreenSupplyChain (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    supplier VARCHAR(100),
    production_location VARCHAR(100),
    certification_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Product(id)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    weight DECIMAL(8, 3) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    sales_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    carbon_footprint DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    energy_consumption DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    waste_generated DECIMAL(8, 3) NOT NULL
);
